name: tm05
effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Kick)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A savage roar that makes the foe flee to end the battle.
flavor_text.emerald: A savage roar that makes the foe flee to end the battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is made to switch out with an ally. In the wild, the battle ends.
